comment: Hopefully he was good in his other classes, because he was so disorganized and unprepared for concept art. We had a few students who were always skipping half of the class because he never gave clear expectations and seemed forgetful. He knows his stuff, he just couldn't seem to get it across very well.
Weiss is a highly experienced artist and an overall great professor. If you take the class and his advice seriously, you will improve. If youre stubborn and cant take criticism, you wont.

It seems like he's been out of the teaching profession for a while. He doesn't give clear assignments, objectives, or grading criteria. It took him a month to get us the syllabus. He's awkward to talk to, and didn't care about what I did because I was a painting major, not an illustrator. Waste of time and money. And I'm a straight-A art student.

Gary Weiss is a very down to earth and awesome teacher. He is insanely experienced and I absolutely loved his class. I highly recommend him as you will learn a lot! He is very caring about his students but he is serious about attendance, don't miss more than 4 days! He's pretty okay if you're a little late. Definitely take him you won't regret it!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational
